title: Reduced PSA Lower grades T206 FS
author: RayBShotz

posts.post_title: Reduced PSA Lower grades T206 FS
posts.post_content:
I've come to the realization that my latest efforts to start "the monster" again can't work for me. I'm largely priced out.
It pains me to sell what I have but its the only sensible thing.
Offering the following T-206 PSA Graded cards.

Arellanes Polar Bear PSA 2 SOLD
Bescher Polar Bear PSA 1 $70
Casey P350 PSA 1 $55
Clarke Portrait HOF P150 PSA 2 $225
Criss SC350 PSA 1 $55
Demmitt EPDG PSA 1 SOLD
Groom P350 PSA 1 (Back Damage) $40
Jennings One Hand HOF P350 PSA 1 $175
F. Jones Hands at Hip P150 PSA 2.5 $SOLD
Tom Jones St Louis Sovereign 150 PSA 2 SOLD
Kleinow NY w Bat P150 PSA 1.5 $60
Leach Portrait SC150 PSA 4MK Must See $110
McGraw Glove at Hip HOF P350-460 PSA 1 $225
Moeller Tolstoi PSA 2 SOLD 
D. Murphy Batting SC350-460 PSA 1.5 $85
Oakes EPDG PSA 2.5 SOLD
Randall P350 PSA 2 $70
Ritchey P150 PSA 1 $50
J. Tannehill Wash. SC350 PSA 2.5 $85
Turner P150 PSA 2 SOLD
Willett SC350 PSA 2 $60

Payment by Postal Money Order preferred. I would consider a check from an established N54 member. No paypal.

I'll take it responses take precedence. Respond in thread or by PM.

Scans of all front/back images can be found here:

[url]https://www.psacard.com/psasetregistry/baseball/t206-sets/1909-11-t206-complete-player-image-set-wagner-doyle-ny-natl-plank-magie/publishedset/388421[/url]

RayB

[quote name="tab" post=2086257]I’ll take Arellanes[/QUOTE]

PM sent.
RayB
